name: part_006
file: tmp_【 #沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE 】沙花叉クロヱと不思議なキノコ 【ホロライブ⧸沙花叉クロヱ】 [rvIy1IOZNtA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe reflects on her previous song performances and explains the theme behind the HoloX Sentai vibe.
A special group performance of 'Kuroi Hitsuji' featuring Tokino Sora, Roboco-san, Aki Rosenthal, Natsuiro Matsuri, Tokoyami Towa, and Sakamata Chloe.

subtitles.original: 「サラバ、愛しき悲しみたちよ」でした！
subtitles.english: That was "Farewell, My Dear Sorrows"!

subtitles.original: どうだったみんな？
subtitles.english: How was it, everyone?

subtitles.original: どうでした？どうでした？
subtitles.english: How did you like it? How did you like it?

subtitles.original: 「アワ・ブライト・パレード」は、沙花叉が
subtitles.english: For "Our Bright Parade," it was the first

subtitles.original: 初めてジャケットに参加した全体曲で、思い入れがあって。
subtitles.english: group song with me on the cover, so I'm attached to it.

subtitles.original: 一人で歌うのは緊張したし、
subtitles.english: Singing it alone made me nervous,

subtitles.original: 声震えてませんでした？大丈夫だったかな？
subtitles.english: and was my voice shaking? I hope it was okay.

subtitles.original: 「この空がトリガー」はイコラブさんの曲で、
subtitles.english: "Kono Sora ga Trigger" is an =LOVE song,

subtitles.original: ザ・王道アイドル！って感じの曲なんですが、
subtitles.english: and it's such a classic idol song,

subtitles.original: 似合ってたかな？
subtitles.english: did it suit me?

subtitles.original: ね、似合ってた？どうだった？
subtitles.english: Did it suit me? How was it?

subtitles.original: どうだった？
subtitles.english: How was it?

subtitles.original: そして「サラバ、愛しき悲しみたちよ」、
subtitles.english: And about "Farewell, My Dear Sorrows",

subtitles.original: ホロックスって戦隊モノ感ありません？
subtitles.english: doesn't HoloX have a Sentai (superhero) vibe?

subtitles.original: あのヘルメットのせいかもしれないけど、
subtitles.english: Maybe it's because of that helmet, but anyway,

subtitles.original: 戦隊モノっぽい曲を歌って踊りたいなと思ってて。
subtitles.english: I've always wanted to sing and dance to a Sentai-style song.

subtitles.original: どうでしたか？
subtitles.english: What did you think?

subtitles.original: 似合ってた？最高だった？ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Did it suit me? It was the best? Thank you!

subtitles.original: ね、わかるよね？わかるよね？同じ、わかるよね？
subtitles.english: You get it, right? We're on the same page!

subtitles.original: やっぱそう思ったんですよね。自分的にも...
subtitles.english: I thought so too. Personally, I think...

subtitles.original: 似合ってて、いい感じにできたんじゃないかな。
subtitles.english: it suited me and went pretty well.

subtitles.original: ではですね、
subtitles.english: So then,

subtitles.original: そう、あのヘルメットね。ではですね、
subtitles.english: right, that helmet. Anyway,

subtitles.original: ちょっと何か、変なぽよぽよ感というか、
subtitles.english: that weird floaty feeling, or rather,

subtitles.original: 酔いも落ち着いてきたような感じがしますし、
subtitles.english: my dizziness seems to have settled down,

subtitles.original: このあとも引き続きゲストパート行きたいと思いますので、
subtitles.english: so we'll continue with the guest segment now.

subtitles.original: 応援よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please keep cheering us on!

subtitles.original: みんな、よらちゃんだよ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, it's Yorachan!

subtitles.original: では。
subtitles.english: Here we go.

subtitles.original: 黒い羊
subtitles.english: Black Sheep

subtitles.original: 信号は青なのか それとも緑なのか どっちなんだ?
subtitles.english: Is the traffic light blue, or is it green? Which one is it?

subtitles.original: あやふやなものは はっきりさせたい
subtitles.english: I want to make vague things clear

subtitles.original: 夕暮れの商店街の 雑踏を通り抜けるのが面倒で
subtitles.english: It's such a hassle to walk through the evening shopping district crowds

subtitles.original: 踏切を渡って 遠回りして帰る
subtitles.english: So I cross the tracks and take the long way home

subtitles.original: 放課後の教室は苦手だ その場にいるだけで分かり合えてるようで
subtitles.english: I hate classrooms after school, as if just being there means we understand each other

subtitles.original: 話し合いにならないし 白けてしまった僕は無口になる
subtitles.english: No one really talks, and once things get cold, I just shut up

subtitles.original: 言いたいこと言い合って 解決しようなんて 楽天的すぎるよ
subtitles.english: Saying we can solve everything just by talking... that's way too optimistic

subtitles.original: 誰かがため息をついた
subtitles.english: Somebody let out a sigh

subtitles.original: そう それが本当の声だろう
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's probably their real voice

subtitles.original: 黒い羊 そうだ 僕だけがいなくなればいいんだ
subtitles.english: Black sheep, that's right... everything would be fine if only I was gone

subtitles.original: そうすれば 止まってた針はまた動き出すんだろ?
subtitles.english: Then the clock hands that stopped would start moving again, wouldn't they?

subtitles.original: 全員が納得する そんな
subtitles.english: A solution that everyone

subtitles.original: 答えなんかあるものか
subtitles.english: would be happy with? As if such a thing exists

subtitles.original: 反対が僕だけなら いっそ無視すればいいんだ
subtitles.english: If I'm the only one against it, just ignore me already

subtitles.original: みんなから説得される方が居心地悪くなる
subtitles.english: Being persuaded by everyone just makes me feel more uncomfortable

subtitles.original: 目配せしてる仲間にゃ
subtitles.english: To my comrades who exchange glances

subtitles.original: 僕は厄介者でしかない
subtitles.english: I'm nothing but a nuisance

subtitles.original: 真っ白な群れに 悪目立ちしてる
subtitles.english: I stand out in the pure white herd

subtitles.original: 自分だけが 真っ黒な羊
subtitles.english: I'm the only jet-black sheep

subtitles.original: と言ったって同じ色に 染まりたくないんだ
subtitles.english: Even if they say that, I don't want to be dyed the same color

subtitles.original: 薄暗い部屋の灯りを つけるタイミングって一体いつなんだ?
subtitles.english: When exactly is the right time to turn on the light in a dim room?

subtitles.original: スマホには愛のない 過去だけが残ってる
subtitles.english: In my smartphone, only a past without love remains

subtitles.original: 人間関係の答え合わせなんか 特にできもしないし
subtitles.english: I can't even double-check the answers to human relationships

subtitles.original: そこにいなければよかったと 後悔する
subtitles.english: I just regret that I shouldn't have been there

subtitles.original: 実際の大半は 思うようにはいかなくて
subtitles.english: In reality, most things don't go the way you want

subtitles.original: 納得できないことばかりだし 諦めろと諭されてきたけど
subtitles.english: It's all things I can't accept, though I've been told to just give up

subtitles.original: それならやっぱ 納得なんかしないまま その度に何度も唾を吐いて
subtitles.english: If that's the case, I'll refuse to accept it and spit at it every single time

subtitles.original: 噛み付いちゃいけませんか?
subtitles.english: Is it wrong for me to bite back?

subtitles.original: No No No No
subtitles.english: No No No No

subtitles.original: 全部 僕のせいだ
subtitles.english: It's all my fault

subtitles.original: 黒い羊 そうだ 僕だけがいなくなればいいんだ
subtitles.english: Black sheep, that's right... everything would be fine if only I was gone

subtitles.original: そうすれば 止まってた針はまた動き出すんだろ?
subtitles.english: Then the clock hands that stopped would start moving again, wouldn't they?

subtitles.original: 全員が納得する そんな
subtitles.english: A solution that everyone

subtitles.original: 答えなんかあるものか
subtitles.english: would be happy with? As if such a thing exists

subtitles.original: 反対が僕だけなら いっそ無視すればいいんだ
subtitles.english: If I'm the only one against it, just ignore me already

subtitles.original: みんなから説得される方が居心地悪くなる
subtitles.english: Being persuaded by everyone just makes me feel more uncomfortable

subtitles.original: 目配せしてる仲間にゃ
subtitles.english: To my comrades who exchange glances

subtitles.original: 僕は厄介者でしかない
subtitles.english: I'm nothing but a nuisance

subtitles.original: 分かってるよ
subtitles.english: I know that
